abstract: A group including the billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn says it plans to bid for the troubled Tropicana Casino and Resort in Atlantic City in a bankruptcy court auction.
lead_paragraph: A group including the billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn says it plans to bid for the troubled Tropicana Casino and Resort in Atlantic City in a bankruptcy court auction.

headline.main: Icahn Group to Bid for Tropicana Casino
